010package BinaryRegions;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.util.List;
014
015import ij.IJ;
016import ij.ImagePlus;
017import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
018import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
019import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
020import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
022import imagingbook.common.geometry.hulls.AxisAlignedBoundingBox;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
024import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
025import imagingbook.common.regions.segment.RegionContourSegmentation;
026import imagingbook.core.plugin.IjPluginName;
027
028/**
029 * This plugin creates a binary region segmentation, calculates 
030 * the center and major axis and subsequently the major axis-aligned
031 * bounding box for each region.
032 * Requires a binary (segmented) image.
033 * 
034 * @author WB
035 * @version 2020/12/17
036 */
037@IjPluginName("Axis-Aligned Bounding Box")
038public class AxisAligned_Bounding_Box_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        static Color CenterColor = Color.magenta;
041        static Color BoundingBoxColor = Color.blue;
042
043        private ImagePlus im;
044        
045        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
046                this.im = im;
047                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES; 
048        }
049        
050        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
051                
052                if (!IjUtils.isBinary(ip)) {
053                        IJ.showMessage("Plugin requires a binary image!");
054                        return;
055                }
056                
057                RegionContourSegmentation segmenter = new RegionContourSegmentation((ByteProcessor) ip);
058                List<BinaryRegion> regions = segmenter.getRegions();
059                if (regions.isEmpty()) {
060                        IJ.error("No regions detected!");
061                        return;
062                }
063                
064                ColorProcessor cp = ip.convertToColorProcessor();
065                cp.add(128);    // brighten
066                
067                
068                for (BinaryRegion r: regions) {
069                        Pnt2d xc = r.getCenter();
070                        int uc = (int) Math.round(xc.getX());
071                        int vc = (int) Math.round(xc.getY());
072                        Pnt2d[] box = (new AxisAlignedBoundingBox(r)).getCornerPoints();
073                        if (box != null) {
074                                //double[][] box = getAxisAlignedBoundingBox(r);
075                                drawCenter(cp,  uc,  vc);
076                                drawBox(cp, box);
077                        }
078                }
079
080                (new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-aligned-bb", cp)).show();
081        }
082        
083        
084        private void drawBox(ImageProcessor ip, Pnt2d[] box) {
085                ip.setColor(BoundingBoxColor);
086                ip.setLineWidth(1);
087                drawLine(ip, box[0], box[1]);
088                drawLine(ip, box[1], box[2]);
089                drawLine(ip, box[2], box[3]);
090                drawLine(ip, box[3], box[0]);
091        }
092        
093        private void drawLine(ImageProcessor ip, Pnt2d p0, Pnt2d p1) {
094                int u0 = (int) Math.round(p0.getX());
095                int v0 = (int) Math.round(p0.getY());
096                int u1 = (int) Math.round(p1.getX());
097                int v1 = (int) Math.round(p1.getY());
098                ip.drawLine(u0, v0, u1, v1);    
099        }
100        
101        void drawCenter(ImageProcessor ip, int uc, int vc) {
102                ip.setColor(CenterColor);
103                ip.setLineWidth(1);
104                ip.drawRect(uc - 2, vc - 2, 5, 5);
105        }
106}
